complaint.description: I had a contract with Cell C but they cut me off without any explanation. They claim I cancelled my contract, but I was cut off before that. They cancelled my sim and I had to buy a new one. They cut me off again later and I had to pay extra for data. Their overall service has been bad for the past two years. Now they list me as a bad payer because I refuse to pay for a full month's usage. They need to fix my name by Experian credit.
complaint.suggestion: Cell C should provide a proper explanation for cutting off the customer's service and address the issues with their overall service. They should also resolve the billing dispute and correct the customer's credit record.

meta.review_content:
Cell c Account Number: **********70

Good day

I had a contract with Cell C.I Phoned them on the 20th December 2022 and said I will bot renew my contract with them for another 2 years.
They then cut me off on the 12 January 2023. After several phone calls and no advise or response to why i am cut of, I went to Cell C shop in Festival Mall.
There consultant told me I cancelled my contract that's why(Remember I was cutoff on the 11 January 2023). My sim has being cancelled and now I need to BUY a NEW one.
I had no choice and bought a new one for R115-00. Then I had to wait for forty Eight (48) hours before it was active.
They cut me off on the 28 January 2023. So I had to pay extra on my phone for data till I could use my new device on contract from a new Provider.
THEY DELIBRITLY CUT ME OFF BECAUSE I DID NOT WANT TO RENEW MY CONTRACT.
I must say there overall service for the past two years were also just as bad. Because they don't have service.
Now they list me as a bad payer because I refuse to pay a full months usage!!!!!!!!!!!
They are a bunch of *********** people. 
I will not pay for a full month, and the interest they charge me.
And they need to fix my name by Experian credit.
